program.name: PUL
program.description: Pulling the cartons from one area and sending them to another area

program.name: CreateMPC
program.description: Creating Master Pack

role.purpose: User can create the under pitch MPCs

role.name: ALLOW_DELETE_MPCS
role.purpose: User can delete MPCs in bulk.

program.name: PITCHING
program.description: The process of filling the boxes with the required inventory is known as Pitching

program.name: RESTOCK
program.description: To provide functionality for restocking carton contents SKU from restock to specific location for which requirement has been already generated

program.name: VALIDATION
program.description: Validates a box before Shipping

program.name: POMGR
program.description: Purchase Order Manager (POMGR) gives the full information about a Purchase Order

program.name: REPLENISH
program.description: Creating Replinshment request

program.name: VBP
program.description: Verification Bypass

role.purpose: Allow skipping of season code assignment

role.name: ALLOW_CHANGE_AREA
role.purpose: Allow to change source and destination Areas

program.name: INV
program.description: Inventory is use to show the area wise inventory to the managers or supervisors for any SKU

program.name: RET
program.description: Return Program is intended for receiving Cartons that are returned from customers

program.name: MAT
program.description: At matching station several checks are performed on the carton

program.name: K2P
program.description: K2P program palletizes yellow cartons of “MAT” area

program.name: WXFER
program.description: SKU’s can move from one warehouse to another warehouse

program.name: BOXQC
program.description: Box Quality Check

program.name: PMG
program.description: The Pickslip Manager (PMG) gives the full information about a pickslip and its status

program.name: CHECKING
program.description: Checking program is a process of cross checking the SKUs picked by pickers and packaging them by putting SKU's into boxes

role.name: UNCHECK_PICKSLIP
role.purpose: User can put a Checked pickslip on hold

program.name: MASTERPACK
program.description: Master Pack program is used to create master pack for those customers POs, who have specified their needs of minimum master pack weight

program.name: SCANTODOOR
program.description: Scan To Door

program.name: SCM
program.description: Shipping Carton Manager

role.name: DCMS8_SCM
role.purpose: Shipping Carton Manager - Status of the Boxes

role.name: ALLOW_REMOVE_PIECES
role.purpose: User can remove pieces from the box

role.name: ALLOW_QUICK_PITCH
role.purpose: User can change quick_pitch_flag in bucket

role.name: ALLOW_EXPULL_TO_DOCK
role.purpose: Allow changing pick mode to/from ExPulToDock

role.name: ALLOW_AVL_BUCKET
role.purpose: Allow to make Ex PulToDock bkt avaliable

role.name: ALLOW_UNROUTE_ORDERS
role.purpose: User can unroute the routed orders

program.name: SORTCONFIG
program.description: Sortation Configuration
